document_data.name: Zeltaebar Datharathi
document_data.mainbody: '''Zeltaebar Datharathi''' was a member of the [[Datharathi]] chaka of [[Vaelan]]. He became embroiled in Pandorym's re-sealing while he aided his nephew [[Warian Datharathi]] during his return to Vaelan in [[Tarsakh]] of {{yearlink|1374}}.{{cite book/Darkvision||7}}
document_data.Appearance: Zeltaebar Datharathi was tall and wiry, with thinning dark hair. He wore a black and gray tailored robe, as usual for businessmen.
document_data.Personality: According to most of his family, Zel never told the whole truth. He was a master of disguise who had passed up on becoming a plangent, despite his family's insistence.{{cite book/Darkvision||10}} He suffered, or rather the people around him suffered, from heroic snoring.{{cite book/Darkvision|166-168|18}}
